description.ruby-sapphire:
Forgets about something
and sharply raises SP. DEF.

and sharply raises SP. DEF.

description.diamond-pearl:
The user temporarily
empties its mind to
forget its concerns.
It sharply raises the
user’s Sp. Def stat.
